<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Guiding Star](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1059)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Chaotic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=25" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 325 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Starknife](/Weapons.aspx?ID=44)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [starknife](/Weapons.aspx?ID=44)_ is made of dark blue metal overlaid with smoky flecks of fused quartz. When you Cast an [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65) Spell, your next attack this turn with this starknife reduces the target's cover, changing greater cover to standard cover or ignoring standard and lesser cover.

<document level="2" id="action-849" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Guiding Star
